biotools.summary:
Petiole Pro is an advanced mobile application, developed to empowerfarmers and researchers with precise leaf area measurements and nitrogenassessments. Optimized for pre-harvest and post-harvest evaluations, itminimizes the need for expensive tools, offering swift and precise results.

With references in 78 academic research papers published by the plantscientists from over 30 countries, mobile app Petiole Pro stands as atestament to its reliability, time saving and the confidence the scholarlycommunity places in its capabilities.
